0.1.name: wordpress/tweet-embed
0.1.description: With this plugin, you can post the URLs of Twitter status updates, just in the same way you would with YouTube videos or Flickr photos. Put the URL of a tweet on a new line in your post, and it will be replaced with a styled box that looks just like the tweets you see on twitter.com.
